featureBenefits.headline: Capture 20.4 megapixel detail, even in low light
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Shoot detail-packed stills and movies, even indoors or in dim light, with the 20.4 effective megapixels Exmor R® CMOS sensor

featureBenefits.headline: BIONZ X™ for more detail and less noise
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: To transform data from the Exmor R® CMOS sensor into high-resolution images, the BIONZ X™ image processor integrates detail reproduction, diffraction-reducing and area-specific noise reduction technologies. This combination makes it possible to reproduce realistic images of truer colours and textures with exceptional precision in real time

featureBenefits.headline: Powerful zoom with less to carry
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Travel, wildlife and more, everything’s covered by the high quality Carl Zeiss® Vario-Sonnar® T* lens with powerful 50x optical zoom

featureBenefits.headline: Lock-on AF for enhanced photo opportunities
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Simply press the shutter button halfway to activate Lock-on AF  . It automatically adjusts the AF target frame size to match the subject size, improve tracking performance, and take full advantage of every photo opportunity

featureBenefits.headline: Adjust light and exposure levels manually
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Use the P/S/A/M manual modes to control the aperture or shutter speed and play with the creative effects in your photos

featureBenefits.headline: Compose with a realistic view
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Easily frame and view your shots and movies on the bright, high resolution 7.5 cm (3) Xtra Fine LCD screen

featureBenefits.headline: Multi interface shoe
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Attach a range of accessories to your camera, like external flashes, studio microphones and more. The hotshoe powers these fixings to enhance your shooting

featureBenefits.headline: Electronic viewfinder
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Take the guesswork out of composing shots. A 201-dot resolution electronic viewfinder gives you a clear, real-time preview with 100% frame coverage – ideal for framing, focusing and reviewing shots. A built-in eye sensor automatically switches you between the LCD display and the viewfinder.

featureBenefits.headline: Shoot smooth, steady Full HD movies
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Film smooth, steady video clips in Full HD 24p, even when you’re walking or zooming, with Optical SteadyShot Active Mode

featureBenefits.headline: Get clear close-ups
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: A powerful 100x Clear Image Zoom fills the frame, for dramatic close-ups that always stay clear and detail-packed

featureBenefits.headline: One-touch remote and one-touch sharing
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: One-touch remote lets you use your smartphone or tablet as a viewfinder and remote control for a digital camera, and one-touch sharing lets you transfer your photos and videos from your camera. Either way, by installing PlayMemories Mobile app to your NFC-enabled Android smartphone or tablet, you can avoid complex set-up sequences and establish wireless connection simply by touching your device to the camera. You are now ready to control your camera from your smartphone to take a photo from a previously out-of-reach spot, or simply be in your own group shot, as well as transfer them instantly to your smartphone for sharing on SNS. No NFC? No problem. You can also pair the devices manually

featureBenefits.headline: PlayMemories Camera Apps  add personality
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Enhance your creative expression with PlayMemories Camera Apps, offering a growing range of enjoyable applications that are easy to download. Not only do these apps give you greater functionality — they are the ultimate means of personalising your camera to fulfil your photographic aims. Note: Services availability depends on region

featureBenefits.headline: GPS charts your course
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: The built-in GPS geotags photos and movies, so you can track your trip's shooting locations precisely. Later, to relive the fun that's been captured in the footage, use Sony PlayMemories Home software to recall journeys, wherever on Earth you shot them on camera. With Map View mode, the path and images of a journey appear on a trail map

featureBenefits.headline: Focus on the moment
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: After autofocusing, you can rotate a lens ring to use Direct Manual Focus to make fine adjustments, for fantastic focusing speed, precision and control for shooting macro and fast-moving subjects.

featureBenefits.headline: Shoot high quality pictures quickly
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: The BIONZ X™ processor is key to high-speed continuous shooting at 10 frames per second and finely detailed image quality

featureBenefits.headline: Intelligent Active Mode keeps blur away
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Have no fear of handheld movie shooting. Intelligent Active Mode, featuring Sony's advanced frame-analysis technology and 5-axis  image stabilisation, compensates for camera shake. This mode reduces the blurriness that tends to occur in images when shooting handheld or shooting while chasing a subject in action

featureBenefits.headline: Enjoy DSLR-like creative control
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Get the shot you want with a manual ring for smooth zoom/focus, jog dial, custom buttons and memory for favourite settings

featureBenefits.headline: Boost your flash photography
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Advanced Flash brightens up dim scenes, lighting up subjects who are further away from the camera

featureBenefits.headline: Add artistic picture effects
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Add up to 13 different creative effects to stills, movies and panoramas without having to download and use image-editing software

featureBenefits.headline: Capture full panoramas with movement and faces
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Just press the shutter button and sweep the camera for extra-wide panoramas of landscapes, city scenes and packed parties

featureBenefits.headline: Works with iMovie and Final Cut Pro X
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: This product is compatible with Final Cut Pro X and iMovie.
